com.chatapp.android.core.chatapphelperclass

Class ChatappImageLoader.AsyncDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • android.graphics.drawable.BitmapDrawable
        • com.chatapp.android.core.chatapphelperclass.ChatappImageLoader.AsyncDrawable
  • Enclosing class:
    ChatappImageLoader

    private static class ChatappImageLoader.AsyncDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.BitmapDrawable
    A custom Drawable that will be attached to the imageView while the work is in progress. Contains a reference to the actual worker task, so that it can be stopped if a new binding is required, and makes sure that only the last started worker process can bind its result, independently of the finish order.
